title: A Grandma Who Played Games Online
summary: Agnes was a 78-year-old grandma from Dunfermline who became famous on TikTok, where she was called EpicGamerGrandma. She had millions of followers who loved watching her play games, use soundboards, and try fun filters. Sadly, she died in the hospital after having a stroke. Her grandson Dylan shared that she was a kind person who always put her family first, even before she was online. Agnes also talked about her health problems, like COPD, which made her cough, and she shared her feelings after her husband passed away. Her story shows that you can have fun and connect with people at any age, and she inspired many young fans around the world.
